description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Roma vs Athletic Club in the UEFA Europa League
title: UEFA Europa League
title_page: Roma vs Athletic Club: UEFA Europa League stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
This will be the second ever meeting between Roma and Athletic Club in major European competition, having already met in this season’s group stage (1-1).
Athletic Club have won six of their last seven games in the UEFA Europa League (L1), though lost four of their previous five matches in the competition in the knockout stages (W1).
Only Manchester United in this season’s UEFA Europa League have averaged more 10+ open play passing sequences per game (17.6) and passes per sequence (4.5) than Roma (16.1 and 4.4).
Athletic Club have scored 15 goals in this season’s UEFA Europa League from an xG of just 10.4, netting 4.6 goals more than expected, the biggest over performance in the competition this term.
Among players to play 500+ minutes in this season’s UEFA Europa League, Athletic Club’s Nico Williams has made the most dribbles per 90 minutes (9.6). It is the sixth-highest rate in a UEFA Europa League season and most since 2019-20 when Mousa Al Ta’mari (10.4) and Adama Traoré (10) exceeded that figure.
